data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Trump’s tariffs do bite — When he actually imposes them
data.description: The withdrawal this week of a proposed charge on European nations over Greenland is the latest example of how Trump sometimes wields the tariff weapon without firing it; And the number of unrealised threats is stacking up
data.content:
Donald Trump has imposed more tariffs than any American president in at least a century but only a fraction of the ones hes threatened. 
The withdrawal this week of a proposed charge on European nat… [+7595 chars]
